title: SOLD: 1908 Dartmouth vs Harvard Action RPPC
author: rholmes

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1908 Dartmouth vs Harvard Action RPPC
posts.post_content:
FS: 1908 Dartmouth vs Harvard baseball RPPC. Great action shot. Game was played at Hanover on May 19. The postcard is in good condition with nice contrast. Someone scratched off some writing in the upper left corner and next to the score at the bottom right as well. Score is also written on front in pencil. Spot of glue residue on reverse. 

Price: $SOLD obo shipped

PM or email with interest.

Thx,
Ray

Click through for larger images:

[url=https://ibb.co/WHzSs4h][img]https://i.ibb.co/b6vp7M0/1908-Dartmouth-Harvard-RPPC-s.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://ibb.co/2yKJpz1][img]https://i.ibb.co/Y3jgV5F/1908-Dartmouth-Harvard-RPPC-rev-s.jpg[/img][/url]
Dang, I would have loved this.  If winner is moving please let me know.
